article: Mrs. Wilson is my neighbor . She  works  at a post office and she meets lots of people  every day  . She is  _  to everyone and likes helping others. She is over fifty years old,  _  she looks very young . She is of  _  height and thin. She has long, curly, brown  _  . She likes to wear a red T-shirt and jeans. She  _  like a movie star. She really likes  _  shopping on weekends and she always buys many beautiful clothes. She always  _  , "Old people still want  to be  beautiful! "People all like her very much.
